E

edu.cnm.deepdive.qod - package edu.cnm.deepdive.qod
Root package containing classes and sub-packages that implement a simple RESTful quote service.
edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller - package edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller
REST controllers for creating, modifying, and deleting quotes and sources; associating & disassociating quotes with sources.
edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model - package edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model
Classes and interfaces that define and manage persistent Quote and Source objects.
edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model.dao - package edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model.dao
Spring Data repository interfaces (aka data access objects, or DAO)
edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model.entity - package edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model.entity
JPA/Hibernate definitions for Quote and Source entities.
edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.service - package edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.service
 
edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.view - package edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.view
Interfaces that declare properties exposed for “flat” serialization of the Source and Quote entities.
equals(Object) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model.entity.Quote
Implements an equality test based on a case-insensitive comparison of the text returned by Quote.getText().
equals(Object) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model.entity.Source
Implements an equality test based on a case-insensitive comparison of the text returned by Source.getName().

findRandom() - Method in interface edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.model.dao.QuoteRepository
Selects and returns a randomly selected Quote instance.
FlatQuote - Interface in edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.view
Declares the getters (and thus the JSON properties) of a quote for serialization, excluding references to other objects that could result in stack or buffer overflow on serialization.
FlatSource - Interface in edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.view
Declares the getters (and thus the JSON properties) of a source for serialization, excluding references to other objects that could result in stack or buffer overflow on serialization.

put(UUID, Quote) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller.QuoteController
Replaces the text (which is the only consumer-specifiable property) of the referenced existing Quote resource with the text from the provided resource.
put(UUID, Source) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller.SourceController
Replaces the name (which is the only consumer-specifiable property) of the referenced existing Source resource with the name from the provided resource.
